Articles.Content: If we have 3 crew cabins conected in a row and I want to EVA one kerbal in the middle one, game tells me "Hatch is obstructed, can't exit", so if i want to EVA that kerbal, system could detect how many conected cabins are in the vessel and auto-EVA the kerbal to the nearest un-obstructed exit and viceversa, If a kerbal wants to enter a craft, and the cabin that is trying to enter is full, automatically it goes to the nearest connected cabin with empty seats.
Oh yes. I said the same thing myself on another thread.
And please while using hatch menu (not portrait one), make it possible to select any Kerbal from ship to go out - if player want to send exact Kerbal from exact position.

Apart from that it would be nice to have some sort of "sleeves" that could connect two different vessels. Just what KAS pipes do, except bigger, so we can pretend Kerbals walk through those when being transfered.
